channel.title: Meet the team on Blue Water
channel.description: Recent content in Meet the team on Blue Water

item.title: Our Journey
item.description: From Dairy farming to commodity trading to cargo heating management service to a full fledged Marine Software as service provider today- The journey of our company has been more than just challenging and exciting. Blue Water Trade Winds Pvt. Ltd, as the name may suggest, was incorporated by fellow mariners in year 2006 for carrying out large scale commodity trading. It took us almost two years to realize that Trade Winds only assist a vessel at sea but not an organization in Dehradun (India) at the foothills of Himalayas, thousands of miles away from sea!
